potential_quotes: The secret wasn't working harder or even smarter—it was eliminating the energy leaks that had been draining his potential.

The Science of Energy and How It Drains the Mind

To understand energy drain, we must first define energy itself.
It exists in multiple forms: kinetic, potential, thermal, and electrical, but at its core, it obeys the fundamental principle of conservation.
Energy cannot be created or destroyed; it can only be transferred or transformed.
The mitochondria in our cells act as power plants, breaking down glucose through cellular respiration and producing adenosine triphosphate (ATP)—the biochemical currency of life.
